title: Joined HRI
content: Joined the Honda Research Institute, Offenbach am Main, Germany. Will be working on Software Engineering and Software Security.

title: ICSE Paper gets accepted
content: Our paper on finding name-value inconsistencies has been accepted in ICSE'22.

title: Distinguished Paper Award
content: Won distinguised paper award üèÜ at FSE'21 for our work on seeding semantic bugs üêû.

title: Joined SAP
content: Joined SAP SE, Walldorf, Germany. Will be working on JavaScript code analysis.

title: FSE Paper gets accepted
content: Our paper on semantic bug seeding gets accepted in FSE'21.

title: Survey on Compiler Testing
content: Our survey on compiler testing methods gets published at ACM CSUR

title: ICSE Paper gets accepted
content: Our paper on inferring JavaScript function types from Natural Language Informations gets accepted to ICSE'19

title: ICSE Paper gets accepted
content: Our paper on finding and understanding conflicts among JavaScript libraries gets accepted to ICSE'18

title: ASE Paper gets accepted
content: Our paper on reducing tree-structured test inputs gets accepted to ASE'17
